name: Floating Along Dream / 夜长梦多，随梦漂流吧
name_original: Floating Along Dream / 夜长梦多，随梦漂流吧
description:
This game is produced during an online Game Jam, BOOOM, held by GCORES.

Gameplay Video:  https://www.bilibili.com/video/BV14f4y1A7xb/

GCORES Link: https://www.gcores.com/games/67472

/Game Description/

Floating Along Dream is a dreamlike game filled with subconsciousness and symbols.

Through the dreams, players will encounter different moments in a random sequence. 

The story floats differently, along with the rhythm of moments.

Keep searching, keep chasing, keep fallIng, keep unsatisfied, keep longing, keep alienating.

Float with your own poem among 720 possibilities of narrative.

/Crew/

Mingrui Cao：Producer/ Game Designer

Ruomai Yang：Programmer

Jiashuo Xian：3D Artist

Haoqian Gao：Controller Builder

Lishi Bian: Composer

/游戏类型/

梦境/随机叙事/解谜/单人

/游戏简介/

《夜长梦多，随梦漂流吧》是一个关于潜意识的梦境模拟器游戏。

探寻梦里的世界，把破碎的记忆串联成线。

通过与他人若即若离 的连接，情绪的颜色在感知中渐次叠加。

寻找着，追逐着，拥抱着，饥饿着，焦渴着，疏离着。

在拥有720种可能的随机叙事里，谱出独属于你的节奏诗篇吧。

/团队成员/

曹明睿：监督 / 策划

杨若脉：编程

咸佳硕：3D美术 / 手柄造型

高浩骞：手柄工程 / 2D美术

卞丽诗:    音乐
